price: Sai suka ƙaryata shi, sa'an nan Muka tsĩrar da shi da waɗanda suke tãre da shi, a cikin jirgin; kuma Muka nutsar da waɗanda suka ƙaryata shi game da ãyõyinMu. Lalle ne sũ, sun kasance wasu mutãne ɗĩmautattu.
arabic: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ وَأَغۡرَقۡنَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۚ إِنَّهُمۡ كَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَمِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fakadhabūhu fa-anjaynāhu wa-alladhīna maʿahu fī al-ful'ki wa-aghraqnā alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā innahum kānū qawman ʿamīna
